nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars Adventure Pack (Poe's X-wing fighter)

LEGO Star Wars Adventure Pack is a boxed set that contains a LEGO Star Wars model of Poe Dameron's X-wing fighter, more than 500 stickers, and the books LEGO Star Wars Character Guide: Light Side and Dark Side and LEGO Star Wars: Mighty Minifigures: Ultimate Sticker Book. It was published by DK Publishing in 2016.
